sc-1.text: Lose a card to negate 5 or more damage.

sc-10.text: Kill no elite monsters or bosses during the scenario.

sc-11.text: Kill a monster you are not adjacent to while adjacent to another monster.

sc-12.text: Declare a long rest while at your maximum hit point value.

sc-14.text: Kill three monsters in the same round.

sc-15.text: Never end your turn adjacent to a monster.

sc-16.text: Be the first player to become exhausted.

sc-17.text: Have the most cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.

sc-18.text: Kill the last monster to die in the scenario.

sc-19.text: Never go first in a round's initiative.

sc-2.text: Open a door and end your move action adjacent to a monster in the revealed room.

sc-20.text: Add two cards to your lost pile before your first rest.

sc-21.text: Except when long resting, never go last in a round's initiative.

sc-22.text: Apply another negative condition to a monster already afflicted by one.

sc-23.text: Move using only basic move actions.

sc-24.text: Kill a monster with an attack with disadvantage.

sc-25.text: Kill a monster three or more hexes away from you.

sc-26.text: Never exit a room while money tokens remain in it.

sc-27.text: Kill a monster and loot its money token on the same turn.

sc-28.text: Kill a monster and open a door on the same round.

sc-29.text: End each of your turns adjacent to a wall or obstacle.

sc-3.text: Kill a monster before it takes any actions in the scenario.

sc-30.text: Never deal the killing blow to a monster.

sc-31.text: Lose 6 or more hit points in a single round.

sc-32.text: Perform a loot action while adjacent to at least two monsters.

sc-33.text: Get attacked by three or more monsters in the same round.

sc-34.text: Collect three or more money tokens in the same turn.

sc-35.text: Play two cards for their lost actions on the same turn.

sc-36.text: Never end your turn adjacent to an ally.

sc-37.text: Have the fewest cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.

sc-38.text: Move at least one hex on each of your turns (except when long resting).

sc-39.text: Don't make any attacks in the scenario until after you've taken damage for the first time.

sc-4.text: Kill a monster attacked by an ally earlier in the round.

sc-40.text: Kill a monster when two or more elements are strong or waning.

sc-41.text: Collect more money tokens than any other player.

sc-42.text: End each of your turns adjacent to an ally.

sc-43.text: Kill a monster in a different room (neither of you may be on a doorway tile).

sc-44.text: Kill two monsters in the same round.

sc-45.text: Take damage during the same round you take a long rest.

sc-46.text: Use no potions during the scenario.

sc-47.text: Never leave a room with a character ally remaining in it.

sc-49.text: Never leave a hex adjacent to a monster.

sc-5.text: Be adjacent to at least two monsters while standing on a door hex.

sc-50.text: Do not lose any cards to negate damage during the scenario.

sc-51.text: Never exit a room with monsters remaining in it.

sc-53.text: Lose a card to negate 2 or less damage from an attack.

sc-54.text: Never have fewer than one card in your hand.

sc-6.text: Kill a monster afflicted by a negative condition.

sc-7.text: While afflicted by a negative condition, apply any negative condition to a monster.

sc-8.text: Never collect a money token from end-of-turn looting.

sc-9.text: Take a rest only on rounds in which an ally is also taking a long or short rest.
